chapter.title: HTML Generation
chapter.para: The website is written as DocBook XML 4.1.2 fragments and compiled into HTML with the Website DTD 2.0. The website task for Ant does not work anymore.
The website compilation has changed with Website DTD 2.0. On Unix-like operating systems, the website can be compiled by running make in the cdk/doc/website/source directory.
Developers without a GNU make system should look in the Makefile on how to generate the website manually with xsltproc, or any other XSLT processor, until this guide explains it step by step.
